mapper.select: SELECT fc.rnum,fc.free_comment_no,fc.content,fc.time_posted,btm.nick,fb.free_no FROM( SELECT row_number() over(ORDER BY free_comment_no ASC) AS rnum, free_comment_no,content,to_char(time_posted,'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:Mi') AS time_posted,id,free_no FROM free_comment )fc INNER JOIN bt_member btm ON btm.id=fc.id INNER JOIN free_board fb ON fb.free_no=fc.free_no
